Plot: Railroad executive Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden form an alliance to fight the increasingly authoritarian government of the United States.
Title: Atlas Shrugged: Part I
Writer: Brian Patrick O'Toole (screenplay), John Aglialoro (screenplay), Ayn Rand (based on the novel by)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Grant Bowler, Matthew Marsden, Edi Gathegi
tomatoConsensus: Passionate ideologues may find it compelling, but most filmgoers will find this low-budget adaptation of the Ayn Rand bestseller decidedly lacking.
